features: 6-Piece Set for Optimal Storage- Veken Shower Caddy offers a comprehensive solution for maximizing shower storage and organizing spaces. With diverse sizes and a sleek design, this set offers versatility for various shower essentials. Say goodbye to clutter as you can neatly arrange soaps, razors, and more. The durable construction ensures long-lasting use, while the aesthetic adds a touch of elegance to any bathroom. Simplify your daily routine and transform your shower experience with our 6-piece shower caddy set

Tool-Free Installation with Strong Adhesives- Experience an effortless setup with our Shower Caddy Set. Enjoy easy installation in 4 simple steps—no tools needed. The secret? The magic lies in our powerful adhesives, ensuring a robust and secure fit that stands the test of time. Transform your space easily, stress-free, and without the hassle of tools or drills. Elevate your shower routine today!

Sturdier and Easy to Assemble - Large: 13.4 × 4.7 × 3 inches; Medium: 13 × 4.3 × 3 inches; Small: 12.6 × 3.9 × 2.8 inches; soap holders: 5.9 × 3.3 × 1 inches; toothbrush holder: 3.5 × 2.8 × 5.6 inches. Crafted from high-quality, resilient materials, this caddy set stands firm against heavy loads, providing steadfast support for all your shower essentials. Its sturdy construction ensures longevity, making it a reliable and long-lasting solution for your daily organization. Elevate your shower routine with confidence, knowing that the Veken Shower Caddy is not only functional but built to withstand heavy use and carry the weight of your items effortlessly

Waterproof & Rust Resistant Materials- Enjoy the quality craftsmanship of our shower caddy, engineered for longevity. Crafted from waterproof materials, and developed with rust-resistant components, this caddy promises endurance by preventing corrosion worries. It's not just a caddy; it's a testament to lasting quality, designed to withstand the tests of time. Elevate your shower experience with confidence, knowing every detail is purposefully crafted for durability, making it a lasting solution for your organization needs

Versatile & Great for families- Our 6-piece shower caddy set is crafted for versatility and ideal for families. With 3 caddies, 2 soap holders, and 1 toothbrush holder, this full set adapts to diverse needs. Whether organizing shampoos, soaps, or toothbrushes, its versatile design ensures efficient storage. The family-friendly layout caters to everyone's essentials, streamlining your shower routine. Elevate organization, simplify storage, and enhance family convenience!

reviews.reviewText: Fits all my things with room to spare I don’t think I’ve tested its weight capacity but I’m sure what I have won’t budge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looks great, does what it should and good price too! Love it

reviews.reviewerName: Rainbow Brite Mom Rainbow Brite Mom
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What I ordered vs what I received
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I ordered this organizer for my bathroom after seeing this repeatedly on TikTok(not this brand but the type of bathroom organizer). I received the first one with some damage and the replacement showed up a day later. I installed and I’m definitely pleased with the product at the moment. I hope to continue to be pleased long term with the stickers because it looks so great in our shower. Thank you to the vendor for the quick replacement!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works on glass, not on smooth travertine
reviews.reviewText: This product has a nice finish and can store a lot of my shower items. However, I was let down by the fact that it did not stick to my travertine wall tiles. They are smooth, but not as polished as marble. I had to stick them to the glass wall instead.The sticker is strong once it is applied, and it can hold several large bottles of shampoo, conditioner and body wash.They look good and help me keep my bottles organized!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, Spacious and Attractive
reviews.reviewText: I love this Shower Caddy set! I got these because I only have a shower so there is limited space. Sometimes shower caddies can be too narrow for certain hair and body products. Not these! They are deep enough to hold all sizes of bath products.I love that Thai set came with different size and function pieces. This makes for so many options to install and use. The installation was super easy, and even came with an extra strip of adhesive hooks. I was able to lift and reposition the adhesive with ease, but the adhesive remains strong once “cured” for 48 hours.The materials are of good quality, not at all flimsy like others I’ve used. I had 2 leftover pieces I will use in my kitchen A that’s how much I like the look of them. I tend to keep a LOT of product in my bathroom. There are so many pieces this would be great for roommates or souses to keep their things organized and separated. Or you could easily accommodate 2 bathrooms if you aren’t a product addict like I am. I highly recommend this set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These look great in my new steam room
reviews.reviewText: I just did a steam room upgrade for my master bathroom shower so I've been trying out a number of different storage solutions. The various suction cup units have worked pretty great over the last month, but I just don't love the way they look. When I saw these I found myself being a little dubious whether they'd work or not, but decided to give it a shot given how they've illustrated the strength of their adhesive using bricks.I followed the instructions to install these onto the glass window in my steam room and they've now been up for more than 24 hours and I'm really happy with how they look. We are using two of the long ones for various shampoos and other bottles, the tall one for my razor and toothbrush, a soap dish one as a soap dish and then the other soap dish one to hold the various attachments and blades that go on to my razor. I will remain dubious about how well the adhesive will work in the long term, but I will be sure to come back and update this review if I have anything come crashing down anytime soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An AMAZING Product with Easy Install
reviews.reviewText: I actually love this shower caddy assortment! It is a very easy install, provided you have a flat, clean, surface. The instructions recommend waiting 24 hours before placing any weight within the caddy. Unfortunately, I missed that detail, and it performed perfectly! It's not often you get a beautifully made product that performs well AND is easy to install. If you are looking for a shower caddy set adds beauty to your bathroom, you have found it! No more of those unsightly silicone suction cups to clean around either!
